ValidationRule.description: Phone number may not begin with 1, 800, 855, 866, 877 or 888.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "ReadyTalk Contact", OR ( BEGINS(Phone, "(1"), BEGINS(Phone, "(800"), BEGINS(Phone, "(866"), BEGINS(Phone, "(877"), BEGINS(Phone, "(855"), BEGINS(Phone, "(888") ), $User.Id <> '00550000000yfEe' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone number may not begin with 1, 800, 855, 866, 877 or 888.
